title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct research on Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) technology, neural signal interpretation, and deaf communication needs. Collaborate with stakeholders, subject matter experts, and cross-functional teams to gather input, validate assumptions, and document findings. Prepare a comprehensive project plan and requirement documentation for further development. This RFC seeks approval for the next steps in the process.

title: System Architecture Design for BCIDeafInterpreter Project: Revised
description: Revised system architecture design for the BCIDeafInterpreter project. This includes hardware and software components, data flow, integration points, neural signal processing pipeline, communication interfaces, and data storage requirements. Considering scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects, outline an approach for dealing with potential issues such as noise in neural signals, real-time processing demands, energy efficiency, and error correction strategies to minimize misinterpretations. Address the need for modularity to facilitate future upgrades and integrations. Discuss power management strategies to ensure efficient use of battery power during mobile operation. Include a discussion on potential implementation challenges and suggested solutions. Lastly, provide an initial outline for system documentation including sections for hardware and software architecture, data flow diagrams, error handling, and power management.

title: Neural Signal Processing Module
description: Develop algorithms and models for interpreting neural signals and translating them into meaningful language or communication outputs.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Design and develop the user interface for the BCI system, including input and output modalities, visualization of neural data, and communication aids for the deaf.

title: Data Management and Storage
description: Implement a secure and scalable data storage solution for storing and retrieving neural data, user profiles, and system logs.

title: System Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components of the BCI system and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure privacy. Conduct security audits and vulnerability assessments.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment pipelines for the BCI system. Implement monitoring, logging, and maintenance processes.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API references, and user guides for the BCI system.

title: Project Management and Coordination
description: Oversee and coordinate the project, manage resources, track progress, and facilitate communication among team members and stakeholders.
